effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Winning Streak! causes Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to have a 8% chance to cast Frostscythe per stack at 30% effectiveness. Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. Additionally, Frostscythe deals 40% more damage to the first target struck.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Winning Streak! causes Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to have a 8% chance to cast Frostscythe per stack at 30% effectiveness. Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. name: Algari Alchemist Stone

spells.description: Equip: When you heal or deal damage you have a chance to increase your Strength, Agility, or Intellect by 20,182 for 15 sec. Your highest stat is always chosen.
Equip: Increases the effect that healing and mana potions have on the wearer by 40%.  This effect does not stack.

description: Can be used for transmutations in place of a Philosopher's Stone.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 9,058 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
